extends AbstractReader<T>
implements Iterator<T>

      • getFiles

        protected List<File> getFiles()
        Get the files that are to be read by this reader. This must be overwritten in sub classes to return the files in the working directory that are to be read by instances of the write returned by #createReader(File).
        Returns:
        The list of files.
